data.message: I'm with the majority on not liking the new update. There should be an option to hide or delete the new camera feature and bring back the chat bar.

replies.message: Hi Kimberly. You will be able to swipe away away when you don't want to use it or flip through Stories that friends have shared and continue browsing your News Feed like you've done before. However, people won't be able to remove it from the app. -Jon
Most of us want the option to remove it
Exactly allow us to remove this along with the other useless garbage Facebook has added in their updates
Agree about bring back the friends list bar why u put an messenger button instead if it's already there is one down ..?!
yes. I want it removed.  I have no use for it
I've tried swiping it away. Doesn't seem to work
Whoever thought of this at fb, should change positions because this BLOWS
Margie Brewer I can't get it to swipe away either
I agree with these comments. I can't swipe away and the camera keeps getting swiped on. I would like the option to turn it off.
It doesn't go away, Jon....this is terrible.

I also lost my friends side bar.  I am not happy
 I have sent a report. But no response

Facebook I like you but please get stronger security updates. People who aren't on my friends list have been able to message me. Every time I try to look for an option so that only friends can message me, I can't find one. All I see is the block feature, and I don't want to have to block every single person every time.

Thanks for your feedback, Rachel. We're constantly working to improve the Facebook experience for everyone and if there's something specific we can do to improve yours, please let us know at: http://bit.ly/2nsjg8Y. -Krista
اغلب الأستخدام الكامرة خاطء وغير صحيح
This is a piece of crap bloatware hindering the usability of the app.
Reported for dislike. Everyone report above to have them disable the circle thing..
Thank you 😊 turning Facebook into Snap chat 💭 and they took away the chat bar. No notifications or warnings 😑

Please do something about the instant messaging message request , put a block on it or something , I  don't like people i don't know sending me messages , as i've said before Facebook is too invasive , while i'm thinking about it , also put a block or something on people's photos so other people can't steal their pictures  , to me that's equivalent to someone coming into someone's house and stealing their photo albums
